duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, manage, supervise, and coordinate all activities of each crew to achieve divisional and company goals and objectives.
Provide training, education, and monitoring of all crews’ activities to ensure proper performance.
Ensure adherence to company policies, safety rules, and governmental regulations for people and equipment.
Inspect project site conditions, safety inspections, quality of work, and materials used.
Estimate projects as needed and ensure DOT compliance for all assigned vehicles.
Communicate daily with internal and external customers and support crews with the proper equipment, labor, material, and training.
Demonstrate leadership skills and initiative to accomplish tasks and provide disciplinary action as needed for team members within the Superintendent’s charge.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years of landscape experience with multiple crew management
